about_the_game:
Cards and Dungeons is an action-packed roguelike dungeon crawler blending hack-and-slash gameplay with cards. Fight through procedurally generated floors teeming with monsters, gather loot, and unleash powerful effects with collectible cards. Will you survive the depths?

BATTLE THROUGH EVER-CHANGING FLOORS

Descend into procedurally generated dungeons, battling increasingly challenging enemies and navigating dynamic biomes. Each floor brings unique layouts, monsters, and traps, ensuring every run is a fresh experience.

MASTER THE POWER OF CARDS

Collect and play cards during your journey to unleash powerful effects. Strategically upgrade and adapt your deck to outwit the ever-evolving threats below.

CHOOSE YOUR HERO, DEFINE YOUR PLAYSTYLE

Pick from a variety of characters, each equipped with a unique weapon and skillset. Whether you prefer close-range brawling or precision ranged attacks, there's a hero to suit your style. Unlock new characters as you progress, each offering new ways to tackle the dungeon.

CONQUER CHALLENGING ENEMIES AND BOSSES

Face off against hordes of monsters and powerful bosses that grow more dangerous as you descend. Discover enemy patterns and adapt your tactics to survive the relentless onslaught.

GATHER LOOT AND UPGRADE

Earn rewards as you fight, using gold to improve your deck, unlock new cards, and enhance your hero. Customize your strategy with legendary cards and powerful upgrades to push deeper into the dungeon.

BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY

With its procedurally generated floors, diverse heroes, and countless card combinations, every run in Cards and Dungeons offers new surprises and challenges. The question remains: can you make it to the final floor without succumbing to the depths?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
